title: Quiz 2 - Puzzles
instruction:
Directions (Q. 21 – 25): Study the following information carefully and answer the questions given below.

Seven persons A, B, C, D, E, F and G live in a building but not necessarily in the same order. There are seven floors in that building and only one person lives on each floor. Each of them likes different sweets, viz Laddu, Peda, Gulab Jamun, Barfi, Rasgulla, Rasmalai and Rajbhog but not necessarily in the same order in the same order. Each of them belongs to a different city of India, viz Mumbai, Delhi, Kolkata, Patna, Ranchi, Pune and Chennai but not necessarily in the same order. The ground floor of the building is numbered one and the floor above it is numbered two and so on. The topmost floor of the building is numbered seven.

Only one person lives between the floors on which E and F live respectively. E does not like Barfi. A does not like Rajbhog. The one who belongs to Pune lives immediately above the floor on which E lives. The one who likes Rasgulla lives below the floor on which the one who likes Peda lives, but does not live on the lowermost floor. The one who belongs to Chennai lives on the topmost floor. Only three persons live between the floor on which the one who likes Peda and that on which the one who likes Rasgulla lives. D lives on an odd-numbered floor below the floor on which the one who likes Rasmalai lives. The one who likes Rasmalai belongs neither to Patna nor to Delhi. The one who belongs to Kolkata lives immediately above the floor on which the one who belongs to Ranchi lives respectively. F belongs to Delhi. Only one person lives between the floors on which C and the one who likes Peda live respectively. The one who belongs to Ranchi lives below the floor on which on the who belongs to Mumbai lives. Only two persons lives between the floors on which C and the one who likes Rajbhog lives respectively. B lives on an even-numbered floor above the floor on which C lives G lives immediately above the floor on which the one who likes Rajbhog lives. F does not like Rajbhog. The one who likes Barfi lives above the floor on which the one who likes Gulab Jamun lives. The one who likes Rajbhog does not live on either the ground floor or on the topmost floor. The one who likes Laddu lives immediately above the floor on which the one who likes Rasmalai lives. C does not like Laddu.

quiz.text: What is the hobby of W?
options: Drawing
Reading
Chess
Skating
None of the above

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: Z – Patna
Y – Bengaluru
U – Mumbai
W – Kolkata
T – Chennai

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is correct?
options: S – Reading
Z – Walking
U – Drawing
W – Skating
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is not true?
options: S belongs to Kolkata and his hobby is Reading.
W belongs to Delhi
The one whose hobby is Chess belongs to Patna
V’s hobby is Travelling.
All are true.

quiz.text: Who among the following belongs to Delhi?
options: T
Z
Y
W
U

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true?
options: P teaches immediately after the one who teaches Computer.
Q does not teach English
M teaches Botany.
N teaches Hindi on Friday
None of the above

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: N – Computer
L – English
P – Zoology
R – Maths
M – Maths.

quiz.text: Who among the following teaches Reasoning?
options: L
P
R
N
None of the above

quiz.text: How many persons teach between the one who teaches Reasoning and R?
options: None
Two
One
Three
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following subjects does L teach?
options: Computer
Reasoning
Zoology
Botany
None of the above

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: Sumit – Red
Trilochan – Yellow
Umesh – Green
Vinayak – Brown
Suresh – Orange

quiz.text: Which of the following pairs represent those who live immediately above and below the floor, respectively, on which Trilochan lives?
options: Suresh, Abhishek
Sumit, Abhishek
Sumit, Umesh
Vinayak, Suresh
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is not true?
options: Only two persons live between the floors on which Sumit and Umesh live.
Trilochan likes Orange.
Abhishek lives immediately below the floor on which Trilochan lives.
Abhinash lives on the floor numbered six.
All are true.

quiz.text: Who among the following likes Black?
options: Vinayak
Sumit
Abhinash
Umesh
Suresh

quiz.text: Who among the following lives on the fifth floor?
options: The one who likes Orange
The one who likes Black
The one who likes Red
The one who likes Brown
None of the above

quiz.text: Who amongst the following was born on Monday?
options: L
F
None of the given options.
One of the persons who work for Capgemini.
One of the persons who work for IBM

quiz.text: In which of the given companies does only one person works?
options: None
Only Convergys
Both Capgemini and Convergys
Both Dell and Capgemini
Only Dell

quiz.text: X was born on which of the following days?
options: Friday
Wednesday
Tuesday
Other than given as options
Saturday

quiz.text: Which of the following represents the people who work for IBM?
options: L, B, A
G, M
A, M
G, L, M
L, G

quiz.text: How many people were born between M and the one who works for Capgimini?
options: Two
Three
One
More than three
None

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is/are true?
options: A – Floor numbered 7 – Laddu – Chennai
B – Floor numbered 5 – Rasmalai – Mumbai
G – Floor numbered 3 – Rasgulla – Pune
E – Floor numbered 2 – Gulab Jamun – Kolkata
None of these

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: F – Rasgulla
E – Barfi
B – Rasmalai
G – Rajbhog
A – Laddu

quiz.text: Who among the following likes Gulab Jamun?
options: The one who belongs to Delhi
The one who belongs to Kolkata
The one who belongs to Mumbai
The one who belongs to Ranchi
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following belongs to Mumbai?
options: F
G
E
A
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is not true?
options: The one who belongs to Mumbai likes Rasmalai.
E lives immediately above the floor on which the one who likes Rasgulla lives.
The one who likes Rasmalai lives immediately above the floor on which F lives.
Only one person lives between the floors on which G and the one who likes Gulab Jamun live respectively.
None of these
